subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Masahiro Tanaka pitched a complete game, lowering his earned run average to 2.02, the fourth-best mark in the majors, and Mark Teixeira supported him with a three-run homer.
snippet: Masahiro Tanaka pitched a complete game, lowering his earned run average to 2.02, the fourth-best mark in the majors, and Mark Teixeira supported him with a three-run homer.
